category.name: Sensitive Info
category.definition: Racial or ethnic data, sexual orientation, pregnancy or childbirth information, disability, religious or philosophical beliefs, trade union membership, political opinion, genetic information, or biometric data.
category.benefits: An online insurance service having access to your medical records, a telemed doctor's office.
category.consequences: We have seen many data breaches after this kind of data, including the 23&Me data breach in 2023, which contained genetic information, among others.
